featured.text: To prevent the spread of the Ebola virus from West Africa to the rest of the world, many airports have begun Ebola ______ for passengers from the infected areas.

other.text: Why was the summer of 2012 so hospitable to the West Nile virus and the mosquitoes that carry it?

definition.zh_def: 病毒是一種微小的病原體，能夠感染生物體並引起疾病。
definition.en_def: A virus is a tiny pathogen that can infect living organisms and cause disease.
definition.example: The flu is caused by a virus that spreads easily from person to person.
